phases.name: Phase 2: Professional Build Setup & Next.js Migration Prep

tasks.description: User: Set up a clean development environment on a separate machine (iMac) and clone the repository.
Prism: Initialize npm and install Tailwind CSS, PostCSS, and Autoprefixer.
Prism: Add a build script to `package.json` to compile a production-ready CSS file.
Prism: Replace the Tailwind CDN script in `index.html` with the compiled CSS file.
Future Goal: Migrate the project to Next.js for enhanced performance and features.
